LanguageData.MyChildIsSick_Stage0_Desc_Male: I'm worried about {CHILDNAME}. I hope he gets better soon.
LanguageData.MyChildIsSick_Stage0_Desc_Female: I'm worried about {CHILDNAME}. I hope she gets better soon.
LanguageData.MyChildIsSick_Stage1_Desc_ParentMale_Chi: {CHILDNAME} is on the verge of death. I must be close. I can't lose him.
{CHILDNAME} is on the verge of death. I must be close. I can't lose her.
LanguageData.MyChildIsSick_Stage1_Desc_ParentFemale_C: {CHILDNAME} is on the verge of death. I must be close. I can't lose him.
{CHILDNAME} is on the verge of death. I must be close. I can't lose her.
